name: Login
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for admin login and issues the token

Request payload must contain the following fields:

USERNAME : STRING
PASSWORD : STRING

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/admins/login

raw 
  {
    "username": "admin2e82KwsamoAUkG@unisolve.org",
    "password": "wHm6eGCL7uFOArs="
}

Response:

200 - OK 

  {"status":200,"status_type":"success","message":"Login Successful","count":1,"data":[{"user_id":30,"name":"admin2e82KwsamoAUkG@unisolve.org","full_name":"admin user","status":"ACTIVE","role":"ADMIN","token":"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..rFN_OYNJxUj3zxclykAe02y0rxrp1jtqmi924rv2haI","type":"Bearer","expire":"3d"}]}
